channel.title: What is the best mid bass in Auxy?
channel.description: There’s a lot of cool basses out there that can be used for mid basses in Auxy, and even some pads and leads too! List some of your favorites here. For me I’d say sweet pads like sweet spring and sweet saw work, and also cube, slope, and House Music Is Back.

item.title: What is the best mid bass in Auxy?
item.dc:creator: Aadam
item.description:
yeah dimension is pretty good

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best mid bass in Auxy?

item.title: What is the best mid bass in Auxy?
item.dc:creator: sleepmask
item.description:
I really like ‘Dimension’ from the Heavy Bass menu. I usually soften its edges a bit and give it a subtle bendy glide effect.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best mid bass in Auxy?
